thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com
thread.title: Ellen

author: Ellen
title: Ellen
text: I have had a terrific experience with dog walking on the Rover App. It was very easy for me to find dog walkers in my area and everyone I have interacted with has been very friendly, helpful and responsive. I have even had very positive customer service experiences when I have had questions about the App or was experiencing difficulty using it. The one observation I will make is that I wish it were easier to modify bookings once they have been made. The process can feel a bit tedious but like I said, the customer service I have received has been excellent!
